Title: Relates to the scheduling of a fact finding hearing after the issuance of a temporary order of protection in family court
Summary: Relates to the scheduling of a fact finding hearing after the issuance of a temporary order of protection in family court; provides that such hearing shall be scheduled no later than 14 days after the temporary order is issued.
LawCode: Amd ยง828, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, in relation to the scheduling of a fact finding hearing after the issuance of a temporary order of protection in family court
